caption.p: ( a)Body weight changes of NDG and HFD mice; ( b)body weight changes of mice treated with plant extract and orlistat; ( c) fecal fat contents; ( d) food intake by mice. Conditions: HFD group (having only HFD), HFD + 150 (having HFD + 150 mg/kg BW plant extract), HFD + 300 (having HFD + 300 mg/kg BW plant extract) and HFD + orlistat).
